long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly transform your text selections into spoken words with the Read Aloud extension!

Features:
- Instant Text-to-Speech: Select any text on a webpage, and it will be read aloud instantly.
- Customizable Voices: Choose from a variety of voices to find the one that suits you best. Customize your experience by selecting from different languages and accents.
- Seamless Integration: Simply highlight text on any webpage to hear it read aloud without the need for extra clicks or menus.

How to Use:
1. Select Text: Highlight any text on a webpage.
2. Listen: The selected text will be read aloud instantly using your preferred voice.
3. Customize: Go to the options page to choose your favorite voice for the text-to-speech feature.

Benefits:
- Enhance Accessibility: Great for individuals with visual impairments or reading difficulties.
- Multitasking: Listen to text while working on other tasks.
- Learning Aid: Perfect for language learners and anyone who prefers auditory learning.

Why Choose Read Aloud?
- User-Friendly: No complicated settings or multiple clicks. Just select text and listen.
- Personalized Experience: Tailor the voice to match your preferences.
- Efficient: Quickly hear selected text without interrupting your workflow.

Install Read Aloud today and experience the convenience of having text read to you instantly, anytime you need it.
